mapper.insert: insert into chat_message (from_user_id, to_user_id, content, send_time, read_status) values (#{fromUserId}, #{toUserId}, #{content}, #{sendTime}, #{readStatus})
mapper.select: select * from chat_message where (from_user_id = #{userId1} and to_user_id = #{userId2}) or (from_user_id = #{userId2} and to_user_id = #{userId1}) order by send_time asc
